contents: Article 17 (Account subjects) ① Account subjects are divided into financial position account and profit and loss statement account. Revised on February 28, 2013., ② Account subjects must be set according to the principle of importance, and clarity, continuity, and comparability must be maintained, and they cannot be changed without justifiable reasons., ③ General business accounting, welfare business accounting, and external consignment. The arrangement and interpretation of account subjects in business accounting are determined by rules.
